alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gadsden; Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 5:47PM EDT until April 27 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Eastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 547 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles north of Quincy to 6 miles east of Carrabelle, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, St. Marks, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Wakulla Springs, Florence, South City, Medart, Quincy Airport and Tallahassee Regional A/P. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
